backend/main.mo: Actor managing access control, user approvals, invite‑only mode, and basic user profiles with admin‑gated mutating actions.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment‑verification feature to related files, components, and tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing major frontend components and pages used throughout the application.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration defining light and dark theme variables and base styles.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point mounting the React app via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React routing setup with AuthGate, layout, error boundaries, and routes for all major app pages including smoke check.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaBallButto: UI button representing a 9‑ball rack ball with state‑based styles and accessibility labeling.
frontend/src/components/apa/apaBallStyle: Defines ball state labels and calculates point totals for APA 9‑ball rack scoring.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaRackScori: Rack scoring component handling ball states, defensive shots, inning flow, auto‑dead logic, and rack completion detection.
frontend/src/components/apa/ApaResultsSu: Displays a completed APA match summary with winner info and detailed stats for both players.
frontend/src/components/apa/RealApaMatch: Provides a form to create or edit an APA match with validation, save/update actions, and connection handling.
frontend/src/components/apa/useApaInning: Manages inning flow state for APA scoring, including active player, inning counts, and turn transitions.
frontend/src/components/auth/AuthGate.ts: Controls access based on authentication and approval status, showing login prompts or gating content accordingly.
frontend/src/components/auth/LoginButton: Renders a login/logout button that handles Internet Identity authentication state.
frontend/src/components/auth/ProfileSetu: Dialog for creating or editing a user's profile, including name and APA default skill level.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Main app layout with header, footer, navigation, auth controls, and profile management dialogs.
frontend/src/components/matches/DeleteMa: Provides a delete button with a confirmation dialog that triggers match deletion and navigation or callback on success.
frontend/src/components/matches/EndMatch: Displays a dialog to confirm ending and saving a match session, handling async confirmation and error toasts.
frontend/src/components/matches/MatchSum: Renders a summary card showing match mode, date, and computed summary text based on match type and data.
frontend/src/components/navigation/ModeC: Shows a clickable card with icon, title, and button that navigates to start a new game mode.
frontend/src/components/players/ApaAggre: Generates PPI and match‑result trend charts using APA data with rolling averages and recharts visualization.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Initializes and caches a backend actor based on Internet Identity and invalidates dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useActorRetry.ts: Provides a helper to clear and refetch the cached actor query to retry backend connection.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity context with login, logout, stored identity restoration, and status handling.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for match and user profile CRUD operations using the authenticated backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base setup defining light and dark theme CSS variables and applying global border and body styling.
frontend/src/lib/accepting-gifts/accepti: Defines game state helpers for clamping object ball counts, applying attempt results, and preparing the next set.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaAggregateStats.t: Extracts APA match stats and outcomes for a player, including PPI computation, and provides win‑rate and PPI‑series helpers.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaEqualizer.ts: Provides APA skill level utilities and maps skill levels to required points to win.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaMatchPoints.ts: Defines the APA 20‑point match conversion chart and thresholds based on loser SL and points pocketed.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaPracticeMatchOut: Computes APA practice match outcomes using loser SL, points, and the match‑point chart.
frontend/src/lib/apa/apaScoring.ts: Implements APA rack scoring, PPI calculation, and player stat aggregation from rack data.
Determines official APA match outcomes from skill levels and scores, falling back to didWin when available.
frontend/src/lib/apa/officialApaPpi.ts: Parses score inputs and computes official APA PPI, validating fields and formatting results.
frontend/src/lib/matches/effectiveMatchD: Parses match dates and computes effective timestamps for sorting, preferring user‑entered APA log dates when valid.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuilders.t: Provides a builder for official APA match logs, deriving win/loss and constructing a MatchLogRecord, and re-exports other match builders.
frontend/src/lib/matches/matchBuildersOr: Implements builders for APA 9-ball, Accepting Gifts, and Straight Shot match records, generating match IDs and structured stats.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers.
frontend/src/pages/accepting-gifts/Accep: Manages Accepting Gifts gameplay state, session persistence, scoring logic, and match saving.
Displays rules and guidelines for the Accepting Gifts drill.
Handles setup for a new Accepting Gifts session, including player info and starting ball count.
Loads and manages the state of an APA practice game, updating racks and scoring while persisting progress to sessionStorage.
frontend/src/pages/apa/PracticeStartPage: Collects player names and skill levels, initializes a new practice game state, and stores it before navigation.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchEditP: Fetches an existing APA match and renders a prefilled form for editing, redirecting if the match is missing.
frontend/src/pages/apa/RealApaMatchPlace: Displays a form for manually creating an APA match log after the fact.
frontend/src/pages/auth/AccessNotAllowed: Shows an access-denied message and lets users submit an access request, handling duplicate requests gracefully.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchDetailsP: Loads and displays detailed information for a single match, including APA-specific stats and outcomes.
frontend/src/pages/history/MatchHistoryP: Lists all matches with filtering and sorting options, allowing navigation to individual match details.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Renders the home screen with navigation cards for match modes and access to match history.
frontend/src/pages/owner/OwnerApprovalsP: Admin page listing user approval requests with actions to approve, reject, toggle invite-only mode, and bulk-reject pending approvals.
frontend/src/pages/players/PlayerAggrega: Displays aggregated APA stats for a specific player, including win rates, averages, and charts based on match history.
frontend/src/pages/SmokeCheckPage.tsx: Provides a deployment verification page with navigation tests to Home and Match History.
frontend/src/pages/straight-shot/Straigh: Runs the Straight Shot drill session, manages shot count state, saves results, and handles end-of-match logic.
Static rules panel explaining objectives and instructions for the Straight Shot drill.
Start screen for the Straight Shot drill where users enter player details, view moving averages, and begin a session.
frontend/src/utils/errorText.ts: Utility that extracts human-readable error messages from various error object shapes.
frontend/src/utils/playerName.ts: Provides helper functions for normalizing and comparing player names case-insensitively.
frontend/src/utils/playerRoutes.ts: Builds the player stats route path using URL-encoded player names.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utilities for reading, persisting, and clearing URL parameters and session-stored values.
frontend/src/utils/withTimeout.ts: Provides a helper that wraps a promise and rejects with a custom error if it exceeds a specified timeout.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, animations, container settings, and plugin integrations.
project_state.json: Defines the project's current state, goals, architecture notes, and known issues for an APA pool practice and match‑logging app.
